header.title: CosNotifyChannelAdmin_StructuredProxyPullConsumer

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosNotifyChannelAdmin::StructuredProxyPullConsumer interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosNotification/include/*.hrl").
This module also exports the functions described in:

func.name: connect_structured_pull_supplier(StructuredProxyPullConsumer, PullSupplier) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Connect a supplier to the proxy

desc.p: This operation connects a PullSupplier to the target object. If a connection already exists or the given client object does not support the functions pull_structured_event and try_pull_structured_event an exception is raised.

func.name: suspend_connection(StructuredProxyPullConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Suspend the connection between the target object and its client

desc.p: This operation suspends the connection between the target object and its client. If no connection exists or already suspended an exception is raised.

func.name: resume_connection(StructuredProxyPullConsumer) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Resume a previously suspended connection with the proxy

desc.p: If the connection have been suspended this operation must be used if we want to resume the connection. If the connection already are active or no connection have been created an exception is raised.

func.name: disconnect_structured_pull_consumer(StructuredProxyPullConsumer) -> ok
func.fsummary: Close the connection and terminate the proxy

desc.p: This operation cause the target object to close the connection and terminate.
